pageContext.claim: “Not only did Congressman Ron DeSantis easily win the Republican Primary, but his opponent in November is his biggest dream....a failed Socialist Mayor named Andrew Gillum who has allowed crime & many other problems to flourish in his city. This is not what Florida wants or needs!”
pageContext.analysis: Crime has decreased overall since Gillum has been mayor of Tallahassee, although murders increased in 2017 and the area has the highest crime rates in Florida. Gillum is not a socialist. He had the backing of Sen. Bernie Sanders in the gubernatorial primary.
